metadata.title: CVE-2018-4208 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In iOS before 11.3, Safari before 11.1, iCloud for Windows before 7.4, tvOSbefore 11.3, watchOS before 4.3, iTunes before 12.7.4 for Windows,unexpected interaction causes an ASSERT failure. This issue was addressedwith improved checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
